steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Locate the picture where you want to add text.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Text Box' button.
Choose the desired text box style or select 'Draw Text Box' to create a custom one.
Click and drag on the picture to create a text box.
Type the desired text inside the text box.
Format the text box and the text as needed using the options in the 'Format' tab.
Adjust the position and size of the text box to fit the picture.
Save the changes to the document.
